description:
Smile loses his match against Smile. After watching the game, Koizumi expresses his rage, saying, "A guy who doesn`t even want to win shouldn`t treat the game like a joke!" Seeing his fury, Obaba asks Koizumi if Smile reminds him of himself 50 years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La seule façon de ne pas perdre, c`est de ne pas jouer
The Only Way to Be Sure You Won`t Lose Is to Not Fight
Zettai ni Makenai Yuitsu no Houhou wa Tatakawanai Koto Da
絶対に負けない唯一の方法は闘わない事だ
